rolePlay.title: Role Play Room
rolePlay.body:
Role Play chat rooms are not for normal conversations.

In these chat rooms you will talk like you are a character.

You can change your Role Play name in Account Settings.

topContributor.title: Top Contributor
topContributor.body: This user has the most edit's on the Unwanteds app!

labels.body: Lisa McMann lives in Sacramento, California. She is married to fellow writer and musician, Matt McMann, and they have two adult children. Her son is an artist named Kilian McMann and her daughter is an actor, Kennedy McMann. Lisa is the New York Times bestselling author of over two dozen books for young adults and children. So far she has written in genres including paranormal, realistic, dystopian, and fantasy. Some of her most well-known books are The Unwanteds series for middle grade readers and the Wake trilogy for young adults. Check out Lisa's website at LisaMcMann.com.

labels.body1: If you are really enjoying the Unwanteds app and would like to support the apps development please consider tipping. Tipping is not required but if you enjoy using the app we will be grateful for your contribution and your support :)
labels.betatipError: Can't tip in the beta. Please download the public verison to be able to In App Tip.
labels.mactipError: Can't tip on MacOS. Please download the mobile app to be able to In App Tip.
labels.body2:
You can also support the app by getting any of the books through the app with our referral link. On any book on the Home Tab you can tap "Order" and order through the supported referral retailers, there you will use our referral code and it doesn't even cost you anything more to using it! :)

Supported referral retailers:
Bookstore
Indie Bound
Books a Million
Changing Hands Bookstore
labels.google30: Google takes 30% of your in app tip.

popupHeartWidget.title: Links with a heart are referral links which help support the app!
popupHeartWidget.subtitle: You can also support the app directly through the Tip Jar page.

labels.body1:
- Customizable Chat Room looks.
- Heart Chat Room Badge.
- Supporter Badge forever in profile.
- Access to special Supporters only Chat Room.
- Support app development/servers.
labels.betaError: Can't sign up to Pro in the beta. Please download the public verison to be able to go Pro.
labels.mactipError: Can't sign up for Pro on MacOS. Please download the mobile app to be able to go Pro.

labels.unwantedsAccountBody: - Must be 13 or older to make and use an account! (Creating alt accounts to get arround this will result in a permanent ban)
labels.artRoomBody:
- If reference picture is used credit the original artist and if possible ask for permission
- Try to keep things original
- Keep things clean
- Must be Unwanteds related
labels.libraryBody:
- Keep things clean
- Use library for actual stories only, with a minimum of 100 words
- Check spelling and grammar to the best of your ability
- Must be Unwanteds related
- Must be original
- Updating on a story is allowed
labels.commentsChatBody:
- No discriminatory statements allowed in chat spaces/comments (definition of discriminatory described below)
- No random spam allowed in chat (please don’t spam the chat) 
- Keep things clean in chatrooms (no NSFW comments  or excessive swearing, we have younger users on here)
- If you see something offensive, please report the comment and-or-user with the report button or DM a Protector/High Priest (marked with a yellow or purple badge)
labels.dstaaBody:
- No racism of any kind.
- No homophobia of any kind.
- No transphobia of any kind.
- No anti-Semitism of any kind.
- No sexism of any kind.
- No ableist statements of any kind.
- No statements discriminating against any religion or culture.
- No religious statements used to discriminate or justify discrimination.
- Any other discriminatory or offensive statements are not allowed, any chats and comments should ensure that all users feel comfortable and safe at all times.
labels.rpChatRoomsBody:
- No hurtful, hateful, or rude comments
- No random spam/don't spam the chat
- Keep to the plot/original plan you and the other's have made
- Keep things clean
- If you see something offensive report the comment/user or tell an Protector or High Priest (shown with a gold or purple badge)
labels.bottomText: You will get banned, possibly indefinitely, for breaking one or more rules.

labels.bodyText: If you can't contact a staff member though the App Support chat room, you can contact us though these ways.

labels.theUnwantedsBio: Every year in Quill, thirteen-year-olds are sorted into categories: the strong, intelligent Wanteds go to university, and the artistic Unwanteds are sent to their graves.
labels.theUnwantedsQuestsBio: Ten years after Alex and Aaron Stowe brought peace to Quill and Artimé, their younger twin sisters journey beyond the islands in this new sequel series to The Unwanteds!

welcome.body:
Hi there! Welcome to The Unwanteds App. Please have a look around. You can comment on most things—just click on them. You can also join your fellow Unwanteds in the chat rooms. Remember to be kind to your fellow unwanteds—we’ve all been through a lot, what with being sent to our deaths and all.

I hope you enjoy. Thanks for reading my books. 

Your friend,

Lisa McMann

library.body:
Hello fellow Unwanted!

The Library is a place for other unwanteds to share their fan fiction story's in the Unwanteds world!

Please keep everything PG all you Unwanted writers!

Some rules:
- keep things clean
- use library for actual stories only, with a minimum of 100 words
- check spelling and grammar to the best of your ability
- must be Unwanteds related
- must be original
- updating on a story is allowed

Happy posting!

artRoom.body:
Hello fellow Unwanted!

The Art Room is a place for other unwanteds to share their fan art!

Please keep everything PG all you Unwanted artists!

Some rules:
- if reference picture is used credit the original artist and ask for permission
- try to keep things original
- keep things clean
- must be Unwanteds related

Happy posting!

COPPA.body1:
To comply with COPPA (Children's Online Privacy Protection Act) to create an account you must be 13 years old or older. Unwanteds app development company "isontic" is based in the United States and is subject to the laws based in the United States.

Children under 12 and under can still view all Unwanteds information in the app but cannot create an account to interact with other users.
COPPA.body2: By tapping the continue button you are acknowledging that you are over 13. If you acknowledge that you are over 13 and found that you aren't, your account will be suspended till your of age.
